Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Silken Torre Garden in Madrid (San Blas), you'll be close to Alcala Norte and Las Ventas. This hotel is within close proximity of Estadio de la Comunidad and Faunia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 100 meters.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has facilities measuring 968 square feet (90 square meters), including a meeting room. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Alcala Norte - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Estadio de la Comunidad - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Faunia - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Torrespana - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Las Ventas - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
Sports Palace Madrid - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Arturo Soria Plaza Shopping Center - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Plenilunio Shopping Area - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Juan Carlos I Park - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Velazquez Palace - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Crystal Palace - 4.8 km / 3 mi
El Capricho Park - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Fundacion Juan March - 5 km / 3.1 mi
IFEMA Convention Center - 5 km / 3.1 mi

The preferred airport for Silken Torre Garden is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
